CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system , the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system has higher EQE values of 30-40 % in the range of 450-850 nm , which contributes to the improvement of I SC from 11.31 to 14.87 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system |
| PCBM |
| PC 70 BM |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be considered as material names, as they refer to specific systems or compounds used in the context of the paragraph.
